attributes.description: Made just for us by House of Dorchester, this milk chocolate bar makes a great extra gift for anyone who's made you smile. And it's completely delicious too. Contains milk and soya and made in kitchens that work with nuts and sesame seeds.
attributes.long_description:
Made just for us by House of Dorchester, this milk chocolate bar makes a great extra gift for anyone who's made you smile. And it's completely delicious too.

  • Contains milk and soya and made in kitchens that work with nuts and sesame seeds

  • As each batch is made freshly, exact decoration colour may vary
attributes.name: 'Thanks' Chocolate Bar

attributes.description: Abstract hey you're kind of wonderful
attributes.long_description: Abstract hey you're kind of wonderful
attributes.name: Abstract hey you're kind of wonderful

attributes.description: What’s better than receiving a beautiful bouquet of blooms to your door? Getting luxury chocolates as well! Spoil your favourite person with this Jewel Box from the experts at Prestat, containing eight delicious milk, white, dark chocolates and truffles. Yum.
attributes.long_description:
What’s better than receiving a beautiful bouquet of blooms to your door? Getting luxury chocolates as well! Spoil your favourite person with this Jewel Box from the experts at Prestat, containing eight delicious milk, white, dark chocolates and truffles. Yum.

  • Containing eight beautifully packaged Prestat luxury chocolates

  • Contains milk, nuts, soya, gluten
attributes.name: Prestat Chocolates

attributes.description: Make their big day even sweeter and add a bar of 'Happy Birthday' chocolate to their blooms. We've worked with Edinburgh based chocolatiers at Ocelot to design this bar of delicious milk chocolate. One of Ocelot's most popular flavours, this smooth, creamy bar of 50% milk chocolate has tasting notes of black cherries and soft caramel. Milk chocolate bar in delightful Happy Birthday packaging (75g). Contains milk. Made in a factory that handles almonds, and bee pollen.
attributes.long_description:
Make their big day even sweeter and add a bar of 'Happy Birthday' chocolate to their blooms. We've worked with Edinburgh based chocolatiers at Ocelot to design this bar of delicious milk chocolate. One of Ocelot's most popular flavours, this smooth, creamy bar of 50% milk chocolate has tasting notes of black cherries and soft caramel.

  • Milk chocolate bar in delightful Happy Birthday packaging (75g)

  • Contains milk

  • Made in a kitchen that handles almonds, and bee pollen
attributes.name: Birthday Chocolate

attributes.description: Looking to really spoil someone? This Charbonnel et Walker Sea Salt Caramel Milk Chocolate will do just that. Trust us. It’s delicious.
attributes.long_description:
Looking to really spoil someone? This Charbonnel et Walker Sea Salt Caramel Milk Chocolate will do just that. Trust us. It’s delicious.

Beautifully packaged, sea salt and caramel milk chocolate bar (95g)

Contains allergens: Milk & Soya. May also contain traces of Gluten and Nuts.
attributes.name: Charbonnel Sea Salt Caramel Bar

attributes.description: This hand-poured candle from London-based Hopscotch is made of soy wax and comes with a handy screw-top lid. We chose it because it smells so gorgeous: a subtle blend of zingy bergamot that’s (almost) as delicious as the smell of fresh flowers. Why not send it as a little extra with your flowers to surprise and delight? Each candle is 100g of soy wax and has a burn time of approximately 25 hours. Hand-poured in small batches with natural soy and cotton wicks. Vegan and not tested on animals.
attributes.long_description:
This hand-poured candle from London-based Hopscotch is made of soy wax and comes with a handy screw-top lid. We chose it because it smells so gorgeous: a subtle blend of zingy bergamot that’s (almost) as delicious as the smell of fresh flowers. Why not send it as a little extra with your flowers to surprise and delight?

  • Each candle measures 7 x 2.5cm with 100g of soy wax and a burn time of approximately 25 hours

  • Hand-poured in small batches with natural soy and cotton wicks

  • Hopscotch candles are vegan, and not tested on animals
attributes.name: Bergamot Candle

attributes.description: Looking to really spoil someone? We've partnered with Charbonnel et Walker to offer their iconic Pink Marc de Champagne Truffles with our hand-tied bouquets. Inside the box, they’ll find eight sugar-dusted, white-chocolate truffles, filled with delicious strawberry and milk chocolate Marc de Champagne centres. You’ll be in their good books all year!
attributes.long_description:
Looking to really spoil someone? We've partnered with Charbonnel et Walker to offer their iconic Pink Marc de Champagne Truffles with our hand-tied bouquets. Inside the box, they’ll find eight sugar-dusted, white-chocolate truffles, filled with delicious strawberry and milk chocolate Marc de Champagne centres. You’ll be in their good books all year!

  • Gift box containing 8 luxury Charbonnel et Walker champagne truffles (85g)

  • Contains milk and soya and may also contain traces of gluten and nuts.
attributes.name: Charbonnel Champagne Truffles

attributes.description: Sending blooms to new parents, or to celebrate a little person’s birthday? This Jellycat soft toy makes a lovely surprise. Super soft for even the smallest of hands, we’ll admit this little bunny is far better at giving cuddles than a bouquet of blooms (even if getting fresh flowers can feel like a hug)!
attributes.long_description: Sending blooms to new parents, or to celebrate a little person’s birthday? This Jellycat soft toy makes a lovely surprise. Super soft for even the smallest of hands, we’ll admit this little bunny is far better at giving cuddles than a bouquet of blooms (even if getting fresh flowers can feel like a hug)!
attributes.name: Jellycat Bunny Grey
